page.title: 06HOUSE TENANCY IN BRENTWOOD
page.content:
The houses within 0.5 km of the High Street are mostly{privately owned.} The houses 1 km from the High Street are on a large estate{owned by {the council.}This was built by a {London}council to accommodate an overflow of people from London.
The{private houses}are about 50 years old but are well-kept.The {council houses}are about 40-50 years old but are in a worse condition.Most of the{council houses}are terraced or semi-detached. The{private houses}are mostly semi-detached or detached and have an average of 3-4 bedrooms. They are bigger overall than the{council {houses}which have 2-3 bedrooms, smaller gardens and often have no garages. This causes problems with cars being parked on roadsides or on pavements.
